## Data Processing
We first change the working directory to the repository location and load our datafile.

```{r echo+TRUE}
setwd("~/GitHub/RepData_PeerAssessment2")
dataFile <- "data/repdata-data-StormData.csv.bz2"
docFile <- "doc/repdata-peer2_doc-pd01016005curr.pdf"
if(!file.exists(dataFile)) {
  download.file("https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2", destfile=dataFile,,method="curl")
}
if(!file.exists(docFile)) {
  download.file("https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fpeer2_doc%2Fpd01016005curr.pdf",destfile=docFile,method="curl")
}

data<-read.csv(bzfile("data/repdata-data-StormData.csv.bz2"),nrows=100000,header=TRUE)
data<-data[,c('BGN_DATE','END_DATE','EVTYPE', 'FATALITIES','INJURIES','PROPDMG','PROPDMGEXP','CROPDMG','CROPDMGEXP')]
str(data)
```
